alert.note: Alert for Hemphill; Lipscomb; Ochiltree; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 8:26PM CDT until May 22 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Lipscomb County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northeastern Roberts County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northwestern Hemphill County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southeastern Ochiltree County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 826 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles west of Wolf Creek Park, or 14 miles south of Perryton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Wolf Creek Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
